info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued November 04 at 11:55PM CDT until November 05 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 9 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...Chinati Mountains. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 9 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
